Menu module¶

Menu.create_bot(difficulty=1000)¶

Creates a MCTS bot with this difficulty value.

Menu.get_user_input(question: str, acceptance_function, extra_help='No extra help available') → str¶

Prevents wrong user inputs, by using a acceptance_function, that should return a boolean that indicates if the user input is in the correct format.

Menu.host_game(player_amount: int, layout_path: str, difficulties: list)¶

Host a game by starting a server and bots.

Menu.is_valid_ipv4_address(address: str) → bool¶

Is this string in the ipv4 format.

Menu.is_valid_layout(path_name: str) → bool¶

Is this string a valid file path to a valid game-board layout.

Menu.join_game(ip: str)¶

Join as player in a game hosted at this ip.

Menu.start_menu()¶
